true.

uhhh, but they dont get any longer than they do in act 5, atleast not from where i am, you get used to the tipying quirks after a while, i remember i hated terezi´s leet speak, but then i just read it like it was any other text.

wait till you meet the pre-scratch trolls quirks, those ARE just eye pain

Speaking of no traction; you know what is fucking amazingly fun to do?  After it starts raining, while the roads are still slick, to get a running start with all your might and begin gliding on the road with your shoes.

*zips past friend*
"Oh hi Mark"
"What a story"
